description:
The Bandshees prove to be worthy guardians of their love potion. Chup and crew consult Sloe White, the sleepy forest psychic and foodie, on this matter. Sloe White advises that, in dealing with divas, one should charm them with music. Chup and pals sing their hearts out, and Commander Ciderfella - plus the Genie ACEs - provide backup. Is this group good enough to get the Bandshees’ special brew?
Source: crunchyroll
